title: SPECIAL SPEACIAL SPECIAL 2 X 1 BEDROOM
posting_body: WE ARE NOW THE BENNETT APARTMENTS AND TOWNHOMES.
COME SEE OUR NEWLY RENOVATED UNITS.
********2 X 1 GROUND LEVEL $1495.00 - SPECIAL FOR AUGUST.
CALL TO ASK ABOUT HOW TO GET AN ADDITIONAL DISCOUTN FOR OUR 2X 1 FLOORPLANS
UNITS COMES WITH NEW MODERN SELF CLOSING CABINETS, NEW QUARTZ COUNTER-TOPS, NEW FLOORING, STAINLESS STEEL APPLIANCES, WASHER & DRYER NEW FIXTURES AND WINDOW COVERINGS.
OUR COMMUNITY OFFERS 3 SPARKLING POOLS, COVERED AND OPEN PARKING, DOG PARK, MAILROOM, LUXER LOCKERS FOR ALL YOUR PACKAGES AND COMING SOON: FITNESS CENTER.
PRICES INCLUDE WATER, TRASH AND SEWER
TO SCHEDULE A TOUR PLEASE FEEL FREE TO CONTACT US
